import React, { Component } from 'react' import Navbar2 from './Navbar2' import Footer from './Footer' import { Breadcrumb, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../CSS/style.css' export default class Contact extends Component { state = { name: "Enter Name *", email:"Enter Email *", subject: "Choose One:", message: "Enter Your Message *" } submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); fetch('http://localhost:8080/contact',{ method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify(this.state), headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }).then((resp) => { resp.json().then((result) => { // console.log(result) alert('Your Message Has Been Submitted') this.resetForm() console.log(this.state) }) }) } resetForm(){ this.setState({ name: "Enter Name *", email:"Enter Email *", subject: "Choose One:", message: "Enter Your Message *" }) } render() { return (
Home

this.setState({name: e.target.value})} />
this.setState({email: e.target.value})} />
this.setState({subject: e.target.value})} >
